context: The Estonian word 'kollane' is an adjective that means 'yellow'. It describes the color yellow and can be used to modify nouns or stand alone. The word has various forms in different grammatical cases: nominative singular 'kollane', genitive singular 'kollase', partitive singular 'kollast', etc. In Estonian, adjectives must agree with the noun they modify in number (singular/plural) and case.
